title: Storm's Echo
tagline: in which the Fellowship confronts a tempest and a giant's dream
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship chases a storm-possessed Kenzo into the magical storm surrounding Stormcaller Tower.
Wellby receives a vision of an orc wearing the Cloak of Rainbows in a castle.
The party ascends the tower, faces storm elementals, and flies to the fourth floor to find the statue of Hralgar.
In Hralgar's dream-like domain atop the tower, the party tells tales to help him realize he is trapped in a dream.
Hralgar regains awareness through these stories, and Kenzo recalls the spell to break Hralgar's enchantment.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship enters Stormcaller Tower, awakens the dreaming giant Hralgar, and Kenzo recalls a spell to free him.
